row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PRV.PROMPTSET.CHANGE_ISSUE_STATUS
row.description: Change status of an Issue in Jira

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Change Issue Status"><properties><entry name="text">Change Issue Status</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
